Action.Name: Window.Close
Action.Description: Closes a specific window on the user's desktop.

Arg.Name: WndHandle
Arg.Description: The integer value that represents the specific window on the user's desktop.

Arg.Name: Method
Arg.Description: How to close the window.

Action.Name: Window.EnumerateProcesses
Action.Description: Returns a table containing a list of all the currently running processes and their associated window handles.

Arg.Name: TopLevel
Arg.Description: Whether or not to return information from top level windows only.

Action.Name: Window.EnumerateTitles
Action.Description: Returns a table containing the window titles and window handles of all of the open windows on the system.

Arg.Name: TopLevel
Arg.Description: Whether or not to return information from top level windows only.

Action.Name: Window.GetPos
Action.Description: Returns the X and Y screen coordinates of a window in pixels.

Arg.Name: WndHandle
Arg.Description: The integer value that represents the specific window on the user's desktop. (Commonly referred to as an hWnd.).

Action.Name: Window.GetSize
Action.Description: Returns the pixel dimensions of a window.

Arg.Name: WndHandle
Arg.Description: The integer value that represents the specific window on the user's desktop. (Commonly referred to as an hWnd.).

Action.Name: Window.Hide
Action.Description: Hides a specific window given it's window handle.

Arg.Name: WndHandle
Arg.Description: The integer value that represents the specific window on the user's desktop. (Commonly referred to as an hWnd.).

Action.Name: Window.Maximize
Action.Description: Maximizes a specific window given it's window handle.

Arg.Name: WndHandle
Arg.Description: The integer value that represents the specific window on the user's desktop. (Commonly referred to as an hWnd.).

Action.Name: Window.Minimize
Action.Description: Minimizes a specific window given it's window handle.

Arg.Name: WndHandle
Arg.Description: The integer value that represents the specific window on the user's desktop. (Commonly referred to as an hWnd.).

Action.Name: Window.Restore
Action.Description: Restores a specific window given it's window handle.

Arg.Name: WndHandle
Arg.Description: The integer value that represents the specific window on the user's desktop. (Commonly referred to as an hWnd.).

Action.Name: Window.SetOrder
Action.Description: Sets the Z-Order of a window relative to other visible windows on the system.

Arg.Name: WndHandle
Arg.Description: The integer value that represents the specific window on the user's desktop. (Commonly referred to as an hWnd.).

Arg.Name: InsertAfter
Arg.Description: The handle of the window to precede the window specified in WndHandle.

Action.Name: Window.SetPos
Action.Description: Sets the X and Y pixel coordinates of a specific window relative to the screen.

Arg.Name: WndHandle
Arg.Description: The integer value that represents the specific window on the user's desktop. (Commonly referred to as an hWnd.).

Arg.Name: X
Arg.Description: The new X pixel coordinate (horizontal position) to set for the window. This is the X coordinate of the upper left hand corner of the window relative to the screen.

Arg.Name: Y
Arg.Description: The new Y pixel coordinate (vertical position) to set for the window. This is the Y coordinate of the upper left hand corner of the window relative to the screen.

Action.Name: Window.SetSize
Action.Description: Sets the size of a specific window given it's window handle.

Arg.Name: WndHandle
Arg.Description: The integer value that represents the specific window on the user's desktop. (Commonly referred to as an hWnd.).

Arg.Name: Width
Arg.Description: The new width of the window in pixels.

Arg.Name: Height
Arg.Description: The new height of the window in pixels.

Action.Name: Window.SetText
Action.Description: Sets the title text for a specific window. This text will be displayed in the window's title bar and task bar.

Arg.Name: WndHandle
Arg.Description: The integer value that represents the specific window on the user's desktop. (Commonly referred to as an hWnd.).

Arg.Name: Text
Arg.Description: The text to display.

Action.Name: Window.Show
Action.Description: Shows a specific window given it's window handle.

Arg.Name: WndHandle
Arg.Description: The integer value that represents the specific window on the user's desktop. (Commonly referred to as an hWnd.).
